main event: Numerous unidentified flying object sightings were reported in various locations such as Goose AFB, Labrador, and other regions during the period of 16 to 31 December 1952.
interesting points: Multiple aircraft sightings of unidentified objects with no definite shape and bright orange and red colors.
Pilots attempted to intercept the objects, but the UFOs maintained the same distance despite violent maneuvering.
A lack of radar contact and no jet or rocket exhaust noted.
Several incidents with different military and civilian aircraft in the vicinity of the sightings.
Pilot experienced second encounter with UFO in less than 30 days.
Sightings of bright, colored objects at high altitudes and fast speeds.
sighted object: bright, colored objects at high altitudes
location: Goose AFB, Labrador, and other regions
